title: Surgeon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Heal a player, giving them powerful defense for the night and curing poison.
- At night, you may perform Surgery on a player you've successfully protected from an attack. Tonight, they can't have defense. The next day, they will have a basic auto-vest, which lasts until they're attacked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can only heal yourself once.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - You can Heal another player (not yourself), giving them basic defense for the night and curing poison. 1 use.
